testcase.classname: Verify checkout function in Green Kart Website
testcase.name: Successfully add max and min price Item to cart and check out
testcase.system-out: Given user go to Green Kart home page.......................................passed And user verifies page title as "GreenKart - veg and fruits kart"...........passed When user capture all prices from descending order..........................passed Then user adds the max and min price item to cart and capture total price...passed And user clicks on cart button then proceed to checkout.....................passed Then user verifies total price previous page................................passed And user click on place order...............................................passed Then user chooses country as "United States"................................passed And user clicks on check box for terms and conditions.......................passed And user clicks on proceed button...........................................passed Then user verify "Thank you, your order has been placed successfully" message.passed
